pages.text:
In villages dotted around the plains biome, you may find an unfamiliar build, the Tavern. Living within you can meet a Vinter, a villager specialising in the production and distribution of wine.

Not only will the Vintner be happy to sell you equipment, but will also buy wine from you for good money.

pages.title: The Vintner
pages.text: For reference, this is what a Vintner looks like.
